data.message: Facebook HQ HELP! I see there are many of us without being able to upload photos to our pages, this has been going on for days and is more than just a nuisance. We have our personal page, community pages and perhaps group pages that need daily photos posted. 'error messages' daily with no solution? I have gone thru your process of reporting the problem to no avail; PLEASE find the error and fix the issue ASAP, much appreciated. Thank you. Looking forward to posting everything soon!

replies.message: We appreciate your patience as our team reviews your report, Irene. In the meantime, you may be able to track the status of your report in the Support Dashboard. Visit our Help Center to learn more: http://bit.ly/2occO6m. -Joe
